Index

dynamix.js

The Dynamix object allows web applications to control a local Dynamix Framework instance that is running on the device. ===============================================================
Supported Browsers
===============================================================
  • Standard Android Browser
  • Chrome for Android
  • Firefox for Android
  • Dolphin Browser HD for Android
  • Dolphin Browser Mini for Android
  • Boat Browser
  • Boat Browser Mini
  • Maxthon Android Web Browser
  • SkyFire Browser
===============================================================

Index

dynamixAuth.js

Remote Web pairing authentication library for Ambient Dynamix. Depends on a modified version of the JavaScript QRCode library : http://davidshimjs.github.io/qrcodejs/
Author:
  • shivam verma
